org.wise.portal.service.acl

Interface AclService<T>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.springframework.aop.framework.AopInfrastructureBean, org.springframework.security.access.PermissionEvaluator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AclServiceImpl

    public interface AclService<T>
extends org.springframework.security.access.PermissionEvaluator
    An interface for a Access Control list (acl) service which allows user to create an acl for an object.
    Author:
    Laurel Williams

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addPermission(T object, org.springframework.security.acls.model.Permission permission)
      Creates an acl for an object if neccessary and adds an ace for that object with the permission specified.
      void addPermission(T object, org.springframework.security.acls.model.Permission permission, User user)
      Creates an acl for an object if neccessary and adds an ace for that object with the permission specified for the specified user
      List<org.springframework.security.acls.model.Permission> getPermissions(T object, User user)
      Gets a list of Permissions that the user has on the specified object.
      boolean hasPermission(T object, org.springframework.security.acls.model.Permission permission, User user)
      Returns boolean true if the given User principle has the given Permission on the give Object, returns fale otherwise.
      void removePermission(T object, org.springframework.security.acls.model.Permission permission, User user)
      Removes the permission of a user on an object.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.springframework.security.access.PermissionEvaluator

        hasPermission, hasPermission

    • Method Detail

      • addPermission

        void addPermission(T object,
                   org.springframework.security.acls.model.Permission permission)
        Creates an acl for an object if neccessary and adds an ace for that object with the permission specified. This adds the permission to the currently-logged-in user
        Parameters:
        object - The object for which the acl and ace are to be created.
        permission - The permission to grant to the user on the object.

      • addPermission

        void addPermission(T object,
                   org.springframework.security.acls.model.Permission permission,
                   User user)
        Creates an acl for an object if neccessary and adds an ace for that object with the permission specified for the specified user
        Parameters:
        object - The object for which the acl and ace are to be created.
        permission - The permission to grant to the user on the object.
        user - A User who will be granted the permission on the object.

      • removePermission

        void removePermission(T object,
                      org.springframework.security.acls.model.Permission permission,
                      User user)
        Removes the permission of a user on an object. If the object does not have an acl or if the ace does not exist for the object, do nothing.
        Parameters:
        object - The object for which the permission is to be removed.
        permission - The permission to remove from the user on the object.
        user - The User who will lose the permission on the object.

      • getPermissions

        List<org.springframework.security.acls.model.Permission> getPermissions(T object,
                                                                        User user)
        Gets a list of Permissions that the user has on the specified object.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to retrieve the permission on.
        user - The User who is granted permissions on the object.
        Returns:
        A Permission containing the

      • hasPermission

        boolean hasPermission(T object,
                      org.springframework.security.acls.model.Permission permission,
                      User user)
        Returns boolean true if the given User principle has the given Permission on the give Object, returns fale otherwise.
